name: The Joshua Chronicles v0.29
description:
Save your game a lot because u might die

Change-log: v0.29 -Removed herobrine -Added Benny Niggams -Added Secret boss (may be broken) -Almost done with daedon cave -Added signs -Added bridge mechanics -2 more enemies (bats and spiders) -obama gay v0.24 -Database work -Bug Fixes -Cave lighting -Route 69 -New music -2 new enemies -Daedon security finished -Daedon shop -Daedon inn -Daedon secret area added -Nick Long quest finished -Outpost Outskirts finished -A lot of other shit . v0.19 . -Working on battle system -Story progression -Nick Long -Daedon Outpost -Message from god -Improved Hunger System -Dark Cave -Bug Fixes . v0.15 . -Hunger System in testing -More map details -Added Crater Outskirts -Many Bug fixes . v0.10 . -Started the game -Produced 2 themes -Created and designed custom main menu -Crater
